oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Aerial photograph of interstate construction in West Nashville, ca. 1968.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Aerial photograph of interstate construction in West Nashville looking west, circa 1968, taken by Metro Photographer William M. King. Photograph shows multiple wooded residential areas surrounding the construction of I-40 in the center of the image. I-40 enters from the lower right and runs to the west towards the top of the image while it splits to the left as part of a future interchange with I-440. Streets identified in this photo include Clifton Ave. and Indiana Ave. The cluster of buildings located between Clifton and Indiana are part of Preston Taylor Homes public housing project, while the street visible near the bottom left of the image is Georgia Ave. Forms part of the Nashville Room Historic Photographs Collection. 1 photograph : b & w ; 8 x 10 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Preston Taylor Homes (Nashville, Tenn.);
